title: U2 1987-04-24 and 25 Daly City - The Unauthorized CD Rips
description:
U2
The Unauthorized CD-Friendly Downsamples of the Most Excellent JEMS Audio DVDs made from Their Original DAT Masters

1987-04-24
01 Where The Streets Have No Name
02 I Will Follow
03 I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For
04 MLK
05 The Unforgettable Fire
06 Bullet The Blue Sky
07 Running To Stand Still
08 A Sort Of Homecoming
09 Sunday Bloody Sunday
10 Exit
11 In God's Country
12 Bad
13 October
14 New Year's Day
15 Pride (In The Name Of Love)
16 With Or Without You
17 Gloria
18 40

1987-04-25
01 Where the Streets Have No Name (microphone rumble at start)
02 I Will Follow
03 Trip Through Your Wires
04 I Still Haven't Found What I'm Looking For
05 MLK
06 The Unforgettable Fire
07 Bullet the Blue Sky
08 Running to Stand Still
09 Exit
10 In God's Country
11 Sunday Blood Sunday
12 The Electric Co.
13 Bad
14 October
15 Springhill Mining Disaster (AKA "The Ballad of Springhill," written by Ewan MacColl and Peggy Seeger)
16 New Year's Day
17 Pride (In the Name of Love)
18 Mothers of the Disappeared
19 With or Without You
20 40


Please view the text files relevant for each date for their separate details.  The JEMS crew neither authorized nor approved this rip, and I apologize profusely if this bothers them in any way.  JEMS has already stated that they intend to release their own CD-friendly versions of their DAT masters in the near future.  I would expect that, when they do, anyone who wasted their bandwidth downloading these files will delete them in favor of the real version from JEMS.

I did not indicate track splits for either date.  Make your own.  I do not know what split JEMS would give these.

Both dates had a few imperfections such as drops or noise.  I corrected all instances that I found.  So that makes these files unauthorized remasters as well as  unauthorized rips.

Do NOT sell this material anywhere!  Giving copies away or trading copies is good for your karma.  Selling this material makes you worthless scum. Of course, if you are the kind of person who does not care that someone would think of you as worthless scum, then you already are worthless scum.

Do NOT give or trade this material in anything less than the current Apple Lossless audio quality.  FLAC is fine, but MP3 sucks!  These files are already dramatically reduced in quality from their DVD audio source.  Don't make them any worse!

DO obtain the origial DVD audio versions of these shows!  They are far superior to the CD quality rips.  You can find them at the following URLs:

1987-04-24 -
1987-04-25 -
